item.title: By: Abe Kohen
item.dc:creator: Abe Kohen
item.description: It is not surprising that Haredi disciples are wont to make up stories about their rabbis especially about those considered Gedolim, nor is it surprising that the Hazon Ish was an anti-Zionist, I've heard enough bubbe meises about my great-great-great-grandfather. In general, Orthodoxy was against the re-establishment of the State of Israel. The correct translation of Haposek is The Decisor or the Halkahc Decisor.
